languages.text: "Всеотец наделил его самодовольством, слишком большим для его хилого тела и незначительной судьбы. Когда мы прибыли в Простор, он был дерзок... пока не понял, что нить его готова оборваться в когтях моих своенравных братьев".

"The Allfather bestowed him with outsized arrogance for one with such a feeble body and modest destiny. When we arrived in the Expanse, he was insolent... but then he realised his thread was about to be cut short by the claws of my wayward brothers."
languages.original_text: "Всеотец наделил его самодовольством, слишком большим для его хилого тела и незначительной судьбы. Когда мы прибыли в Простор, он был дерзок... пока не понял, что нить его готова оборваться в когтях моих своенравных братьев".

traits.locale_text: "The Allfather bestowed him with outsized arrogance for one with such a feeble body and modest destiny. When we arrived in the Expanse, he was insolent... but then he realised his thread was about to be cut by the claws of my wayward brothers."

"The Allfather bestowed him with outsized arrogance for one with such a feeble body and modest destiny. When we arrived in the Expanse, he was insolent... but then he realised his thread was about to be cut by the claws of my wayward brothers."

"The Allfather bestowed him with outsized arrogance for one with such a feeble body and modest destiny. When we arrived in the Expanse, he was insolent... but then he realised his thread was about to be cut by the claws of my wayward brothers."

"The Allfather bestowed him with outsized arrogance for one with such a feeble body and modest destiny. When we arrived in the Expanse, he was insolent... but then he realised his thread was about to be cut by the claws of my wayward brothers."

languages.text: “全父赋予了他超乎寻常的傲慢，可他的身体却很脆弱，命运也黯淡无光。我们刚刚抵达科罗努斯扩区的时候，他对我们很是无礼……但随后他便意识到，我那群不守规矩的兄弟们，很快就会用利爪切断他那些细线。”
languages.original_text: "The Allfather bestowed him with outsized arrogance for one with such a feeble body and modest destiny. When we arrived in the Expanse, he was insolent... but then he realised his thread was about to be cut short by the claws of my wayward brothers."

traits.locale_text: “全父赋予了他超乎寻常的傲慢，可他的身体却很脆弱，命运也黯淡无光。我们刚刚抵达科罗努斯扩区的时候，他对我们很是无礼……但随后他便意识到，我那群不守规矩的兄弟们，很快就会用利爪切断他那些细线。”
“全父赋予了他超乎寻常的傲慢，可他的身体却很脆弱，命运也黯淡无光。我们刚刚抵达科罗努斯扩区的时候，他对我们很是无礼……但随后他便意识到，我那群不守规矩的兄弟们，很快就会用利爪切断他那些细线。”

languages.text: «El Padre de todas las cosas le dio una arrogancia desmesurada para alguien con un cuerpo tan endeble y un destino tan modesto. Cuando llegamos a la Extensión, se mostró insolente... hasta que se dio cuenta de que las garras de mis hermanos descarriados iban a segar su vida».
languages.original_text: "The Allfather bestowed him with outsized arrogance for one with such a feeble body and modest destiny. When we arrived in the Expanse, he was insolent... but then he realised his thread was about to be cut short by the claws of my wayward brothers."

traits.locale_text: «El Padre de todas las cosas le dio una arrogancia desmesurada para alguien con un cuerpo tan endeble y un destino tan modesto. Cuando llegamos a la Extensión, se mostró insolente... hasta que se dio cuenta de que las garras de mis hermanos descarriados iban a segar su vida».

languages.text: 「全知の父は彼に、このような弱々しい身体と控えめな運命の持ち主にしては、桁外れの傲慢さを授けた。エクスパンスに到着したとき、彼は横柄な態度をとった…だがその後、彼は自分の糸が我が道を行く兄弟たちの爪によって切られようとしていることに気づいた」
languages.original_text: "The Allfather bestowed him with outsized arrogance for one with such a feeble body and modest destiny. When we arrived in the Expanse, he was insolent... but then he realised his thread was about to be cut short by the claws of my wayward brothers."

traits.locale_text: 「全知の父は彼に、このような弱々しい身体と控えめな運命の持ち主にしては、桁外れの傲慢さを授けた。エクスパンスに到着したとき、彼は横柄な態度をとった…だがその後、彼は自分の糸が我が道を行く兄弟たちの爪によって切られようとしていることに気づいた」

languages.text: "Der Allvater hat ihn mit übermäßig großer Arroganz für jemanden mit einem solch schwachen Körper und einer solch bescheidenen Bestimmung gesegnet. Als wir in der Ausdehnung eintrafen, war er anmaßend ... doch dann erkannte er, dass sein Faden drohte, von den Klauen meiner launischen Brüder durchtrennt zu werden."
languages.original_text: "The Allfather bestowed him with outsized arrogance for one with such a feeble body and modest destiny. When we arrived in the Expanse, he was insolent... but then he realised his thread was about to be cut short by the claws of my wayward brothers."

traits.locale_text: "Der Allvater hat ihn mit übermäßig großer Arroganz für jemanden mit einem solch schwachen Körper und einer solch bescheidenen Bestimmung gesegnet. Als wir in der Ausdehnung eintrafen, war er anmaßend ... doch dann erkannte er, dass sein Faden drohte, von den Klauen meiner launischen Brüder durchtrennt zu werden."

"Der Allvater hat ihn mit übermäßig großer Arroganz für jemanden mit einem solch schwachen Körper und einer solch bescheidenen Bestimmung gesegnet. Als wir in der Ausdehnung eintrafen, war er anmaßend ... doch dann erkannte er, dass sein Faden drohte, von den Klauen meiner launischen Brüder durchtrennt zu werden."

languages.text: « Le Père de Tous l'a affublé d'une arrogance disproportionnée pour son corps si faible et son destin si modeste. Lorsque nous avons rejoint les Étendues, il s'est montré insolent... avant de se rendre compte que son fil allait vite être tranché par les griffes de mes frères perdus. »
languages.original_text: "The Allfather bestowed him with outsized arrogance for one with such a feeble body and modest destiny. When we arrived in the Expanse, he was insolent... but then he realised his thread was about to be cut short by the claws of my wayward brothers."

traits.locale_text: « Le Père de Tous l'a affublé d'une arrogance disproportionnée pour son corps si faible et son destin si modeste. Lorsque nous avons rejoint les Étendues, il s'est montré insolent... avant de se rendre compte que son fil allait vite être tranché par les griffes de mes frères perdus. »

languages.original_text: "The Allfather bestowed him with outsized arrogance for one with such a feeble body and modest destiny. When we arrived in the Expanse, he was insolent... but then he realised his thread was about to be cut by the claws of my wayward brothers."

languages.text: "Yücebaba, çelimsiz bedeni ve gösterişsiz kaderine göre ona biraz fazla kibir bahşetmiş. Enginlik'e geldiğimizde bize küstahça davrandı... Fakat sonra ipinin dik başlı kardeşlerim tarafından kesileceğini anladı."
languages.original_text: "The Allfather bestowed him with outsized arrogance for one with such a feeble body and modest destiny. When we arrived in the Expanse, he was insolent... but then he realised his thread was about to be cut short by the claws of my wayward brothers."

traits.locale_text: "Yücebaba, çelimsiz bedeni ve gösterişsiz kaderine göre ona biraz fazla kibir bahşetmiş. Enginlik'e geldiğimizde bize küstahça davrandı... Fakat sonra ipinin benim dik başlı kardeşlerim tarafından kesileceğini anladı."
